column2: "Na ibedzi wo nsaano edwuma: Ebɛyɛ ɔhomkanyi
"Wo yer bɛyɛ dɛ wenyindua a ɔsow
column3: wɔ wo fie adankyir: Wo mba botwa wo pon ho ehyia dɛ ngodua ntsetsɛwee."
dɛm na wobesi ehyira Nyia osuro EWURADZE."

column2: "EWURADZE fi Zion behyira wo: Na ibohu Jerusalɛm ne yieyɛ wo nkwa nda nyinara."

column3: ibohu wo mba hɔn mba. Asomdwee mbra Israel do."
